I think before you add any comments onto this or any other game posts everybody needs to take a class on how to crack things.  Most of the time these games require a program to "mount" the disc "image" (IE: tricking your computer into thinking you have the game CD when you don't)  But wait, that's not all you have to do, there is usually a "crack" file or folder which you need to move into the installed folder.  another way of "tricking" your computer.  But wait, that's still not it, you need to make a shortcut of the cracked executable file and run the game from the crack.  So before you start commenting on how "it doesn't work"  or listing obscure error messages which we don't care about, learn how to do this correctly.  

I'm sure there's a wiki or how-to somewhere. 

IF you still don't get it, give up, and buy the disc because this is beyond you.

If you are missing a .dll file from any game, cracked or not, you can find it by typing the name of that .dll into google. (.dll is a file that has been uploaded to the net before.)
use www.dll-files.com to get your missing dll files and put them into the system32 directory. that should work
